movies.title: Walking with the Dog
movies.originalTitle: Inu to arukeba: Chirori to Tamura
movies.plot: Dumped by a bored pet owner, a mixed-breed mutt ends up with three time loser Yasuyuki, who's loveless, homeless and jobless. Yasuyuki finds solace in the dog, whom he calls Tamura, and uses it to mend fences with his ex, who's distracted by her mother's debilitating illness. A trip to a hospital reveals Tamura's ability to comfort dying patients, leading to dog and master attending the real-life Japanese Therapy Dogs training school.
movies.simplePlot: Dumped by a bored pet owner, a mixed-breed mutt ends up with three time loser Yasuyuki, who's loveless, homeless and jobless. Yasuyuki finds solace in the dog, whom he calls Tamura, and ...

biography.bio: Naoki Tanaka was born on April 26, 1971 in Toyonaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Un été avec Coo (2007), All About Our House (2001) and Walking with the Dog (2004).
biography.name: Naoki Tanaka

biography.bio: Ryô was born on January 17, 1973 in Saitama, Japan as Yumiko Satô. She is an actress and director, known for Gemini (1999), Alive (2002) and Casshern (2004).
biography.name: Ryô

biography.bio: Chirori is an actress, known for Walking with the Dog (2004).
biography.name: Chirori

biography.bio: Peace is an actor, known for Walking with the Dog (2004).
biography.name: Peace

biography.bio: The actress Mayumi Tenkô was born and raised in Fukuoka in Southwestern Japan on December 10th 1948. She was an actress on Fuji TV's drama Goingu Mai Homu. (Going My Home). She is also a stage actress who also started a musical group for the theatre. She speaks English and Indonesian.
biography.name: Mayumi Tenkô

biography.bio: Ai Serikawa is an actress, known for Walking with the Dog (2004) and Tengoku no sûpu (2008).
biography.name: Ai Serikawa

biography.bio: Mutsuko Sakura was born on February 15, 1921 in Tokyo, Japan. She was an actress, known for Tokyo Story (1953), Maborosi (1995) and Floating Weeds (1959). She died on January 23, 2005 in Yoyogi, Tokyo.
biography.name: Mutsuko Sakura

biography.bio: Tomio Aoki was born on October 7, 1923. He was an actor, known for I Was Born, But... (1932), The Burmese Harp (1956) and Histoire d'herbes flottantes (1934). He died on January 24, 2004 in Setagaya, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Tomio Aoki

biography.bio: Kyûsaku Shimada was born on April 24, 1955 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Shin Godzilla (2016), Tokyo: The Last Megalopolis (1988) and The Princess Blade (2001).
biography.name: Kyûsaku Shimada

biography.bio: Hidekazu Mashima is an actor, known for Fish Story (2009), Double Suicide Elegy (2005) and Ju-on: The grudge 2 (2003).
biography.name: Hidekazu Mashima

biography.bio: Shin Yazawa was born on March 16, 1981 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Kamikaze Girls (2004), Call Girls (1997) and Guuzen nimo saiaku na shounen (2003).
biography.name: Shin Yazawa

biography.bio: Suneohair was born as Kenji Watanabe. He is an actor and composer, known for Walking with the Dog (2004), Hi-Zai (2012) and Tokyo Serendipity (2007). He has been married to Rie Tomosaka since June 2011. He was previously married to unknown.
biography.name: Suneohair

biography.bio: Yumi Yoshimura was born on January 30, 1975 in Neyagawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi (2004), Hi Hi Puffy bu (2006) and Neighbour No. 13 (2005). She was previously married to Takanori Nishikawa.
biography.name: Yumi Yoshimura

biography.bio: Jin Katagiri is an actor, known for The Quiz Show (2008), Sei kazoku - yamatoji (2010) and Uchû inusakusen (2010).
biography.name: Jin Katagiri

biography.bio: Miako Tadano was born on October 2, 1973 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress and writer, known for Blood and Bones (2004), Survive Style 5+ (2004) and The Ripples (2002). She is married to Tomoyuki Furumaya. They have one child.
biography.name: Miako Tadano
